author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Mahila Court here on Friday convicted and sentenced a 55-year-old man to undergo rigorous imprisonment for sexually assaulting a minor girl at Navalur Kuttapattu near here in February 2015.

Delivering the verdict, Judge Jacintha Martin imposed fine amount on S. Maria Joseph — a labourer.

The court found Maria Joseph guilty and sentenced him to undergo five years rigorous imprisonment under Section 366 (A) (procuration of minor girl) besides imposing fine of Rs. 1,000.

The judge sentenced him to undergo three years rigorous imprisonment under sections 7 and 8 of the Protection of Children from Sexual Offences Act, 2012 besides imposing fine of Rs. 500.

According to the prosecution, the period of imprisonment for the two sentences were ordered to run concurrently.
title: Man found guilty for sexually assaulting girl
